Harga Emas Antam Turun Rp 8.000 Jadi Rp 750.000/Gram
06 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Harga emas batangan milik PT Aneka Tambang Tbk (Antam) hari ini turun Rp 8.000. Artinya harga emas Antam berada di Rp 750.000/gram.Demikian dikutip detikcom dari situs perdagangan Logam Mulia Antam, Rabu (5/11/2019).Sementara itu, harga buyback atau pembelian kembali emas Antam juga turun Rp 8.500 di level Rp 669.500/gram. Harga buyback ini berarti, jika Anda ingin menjual emas, maka Antam akan membelinya dengan harga tersebut.Harga emas batangan tersebut sudah termasuk PPh 22 sebesar 0,9%. Bila ingin mendapatkan potongan pajak lebih rendah, yaitu sebesar 0,45% maka bawa NPWP saat transaksi.Berikut rincian harga emas Antam hari ini:

Pecahan 1 gram Rp 750.000
Pecahan 5 gram Rp 3.570.000
Pecahan 10 gram Rp 7.075.000
Pecahan 25 gram Rp 17.580.000
Pecahan 50 gram Rp 35.085.000
Pecahan 100 gram Rp 70.100.000
Pecahan 250 gram Rp 175.000.000
Pecahan 500 gram Rp 349.800.000

Antam's Gold Price Declines IDR 8,000 to IDR 750,000 / Gram
06 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - The price of gold bars owned by PT Aneka Tambang Tbk (Antam) today dropped Rp 8,000. This means that Antam's gold price is at Rp 750,000 / gram. Thus quoted from the Antam Precious Metals trading site, Wednesday (11/5/2019). Meanwhile, the buyback or repurchase price of Antam's gold also fell Rp 8,500 at the level of Rp 669,500 / gram . This buyback price means, if you want to sell gold, then Antam will buy it at that price. The price of the gold bar includes PPh 22 of 0.9%. If you want to get a lower tax cut, which is equal to 0.45%, then bring your NPWP during the transaction. Here are Antam's gold price details today:

Fraction of 1 gram IDR 750,000
5 gram fraction Rp. 3,570,000
10 gram fraction Rp 7,075,000
The 25 gram fraction is Rp. 17,580,000
50 gram fraction of Rp 35,085,000
100 gram fraction of Rp. 70,100,000
250 gram fraction Rp 175,000,000
500 gram fraction of Rp. 349,800,000
